# **Datathon Resource Repository**

<!--- ### *Resource Repository* {style="padding-top: 0px;"} --->
This site is a catalog of projects related to various water resource issues that are relevant to datathons and similar events sponsored by or held in collaboration with [California State Water Resources Control Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/). This site is maintained by the Water Board's Office of Information Management and Analysis.
